Summary: I saw two shining orbs over Atlanta
divs: Sighting Details 1. I was sitting in my vehicle right after lunch,talking to my mother on cell phone.2. I was overlooking a jobsite when a bright silvery light caught my attentionas it rose over a tree line about 300 away. It rose slowly but steadily until iteither went behind a cloud or through it. I estimate the clouds were 1 to 2thousand feet...it came thru the clouds and continued to a point that would beabout 35 to 40 degrees above the horizon. I thought it may have been a planelanding light...but I was too close to Hartsfield Airport for a plane to be onthat north to south route. As the object reached the peak it stopped and justsat there. I told my mother on the phone that I think Im having my first UFOexperienceand became very interested in the object. I took out mybinoculars,switched off the engine and steadied them on my open door. The binoc.are a 16x50 bushnell...I brace and focused on the object. It was clearly aspherical object, cream colored and hovering..the perimeter of the object seemedto shimmy a little but i think that may have been the binoculars. I told my callwhat was happening and out of nowhere a second object appeared at a 50 or 60degree above and to the east of 1. 2 moved downward....stopped..accended to itsoriginal elevation then stopped...then 1slowly approached 2..at arms lenght I would say they were about two fingersapart...they moved in unison to the east, stopped,then very slowly moved to theS.W. thats when I realized I needed a witness..I saw a heavy equipment operatornorth of me..I got into my vehicle...drove about 200 watching all the time. justas I got near the operator the objects winked out of sight..
